title: Vaccine passports...
cleaned_text:
I've chosen to get the Pfizer shots. I wasn't going to, but I have two people I trust very much who convinced me to do it.

 

 That said, as a libertarian who shares the Founders belief that government is not to be trusted, I agree with you.

 

 Any time the government (at any level) tries to force you to do something, either through a mandate or by withholding liberties, that's the first step down a very dark and very Unamerican road.

Good for you. Can I ask about the two people who convinced you to do this? Why do you trust them? Are they doctors, or have some special expertise that makes their opinion important to you? Or maybe you were told you could not see your grandkids until you got vaccinated?
